name: Lysandra Moonshadow
appearance: With long, raven-black hair that seems to shimmer with an ethereal light, and piercing icy blue eyes that seem to see right through the soul. She wears a dark, flowing robe adorned with arcane symbols, and carries a staff covered in silver runes.

stunts.name: Arcane Reflexes
stunts.description: When dodging or evading danger, Lysandra can use her staff to deflect magical attacks or create barriers.

stunts.name: Mystic Insight
stunts.description: Lysandra has an uncanny ability to sense when someone is lying and can often predict the intentions of others. She rolls a d10 at the GM's discretion.

stunts.name: Shadowy Connections
stunts.description: Lysandra has contacts in many shadowy places, from secret covens to hidden dungeons. Her patron will always show up when she needs help or resources most.

fears: Being betrayed by those she trusts
desires: To unravel the secrets of magic and its power
To protect the innocent from dark forces

backstory.origin: Born into a lineage of powerful mages, Lysandra was raised with arcane knowledge and forbidden rituals.
backstory.formativeEvent: At the age of seven, her family was brutally murdered by unknown assailants. The event left her traumatized and seeking answers in the shadows.
backstory.secret: Lysandra carries within her a stolen relic from her family's past - an ancient amulet said to hold immense power over darkness.
backstory.summary: Now a wandering mage, she searches for clues about her heritage while evading those who wish to exploit her magical abilities.

quirks: Speaks in a low, hushed tone

loc-1764195429228.name: The Obsidian Crossroads
loc-1764195429228.details: Lysandra gained a deeper understanding of the area's significance as a nexus of dark magic and shadowy cult activity. She recognized that this location is known to her mysterious patron, who often appears when she needs help or resources.
